${ModID}:StrikeOfMidnight.NAME: Strike of Midnight
${ModID}:StrikeOfMidnight.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Channel 1 Dark.

${ModID}:StrikeOfLuck.NAME: Strike of Luck
${ModID}:StrikeOfLuck.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 1 to 3 times.

${ModID}:LightningStrike.NAME: Lightning Strike
${ModID}:LightningStrike.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL Channel 1 Lightning.

${ModID}:PenaltyStrike.NAME: Penalty Strike
${ModID}:PenaltyStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Enemy loses !M! Strength. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:Backstrike.NAME: Backstrike
${ModID}:Backstrike.DESCRIPTION: 获得 !B! 点 格挡 。 NL ${ModID}:Modify all Attacks in hand: "Name gains Strike."

${ModID}:WorkersStrike.NAME: Worker's Strike
${ModID}:WorkersStrike.DESCRIPTION: 造成 !D! 点伤害。 NL Draw an Attack. If it is a Strike, gain [E].

${ModID}:StrikeDummyJr.NAME: Strike Dummy Jr.
${ModID}:StrikeDummyJr.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Strikes deal 2 more damage 本场战斗.

${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.NAME: Different Strikes
${ModID}:DifferentStrikes.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all cards in hand. Replace them with random Strikes that cost 1 less. NL 消耗 。

${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.NAME: Strike of Genius
${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a random "Strike". NL It costs 0 until played and gains 消耗 。
${ModID}:StrikeOfGenius.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain a random Upgraded "Strike". NL It costs 0 until played and gains 消耗 。

${ModID}:StrikeABargain.NAME: Strike a Bargain
${ModID}:StrikeABargain.DESCRIPTION: Your Attacks costs 0 this turn. You cannot play non-Attacks this turn.
